ygData.subject: Re: Info Needed on items Spoilers are Accepted and wanted

ygData.messageBody:
To All Bards Out There,

Im in desperate need of some info here. I myself has a natural curiosity
about new things. So my Bard character has an even greater on new and
interesting items. With that in mind, I would appreciate any info on how to
obtain the followin items. Electrum Bladed Wakazashi (Very disappointed
that the Lute quest doesn't work, even tho I'm not nearly high nuff to try
for it yet) Short Sword of the Ykesha (which mob and where drops this item?
I heard its in Upper Guk?) Mithril Armor (Where and how I find any of these
pieces) Adamantite Armor(Double for this info I like to know if its better
than Mithril).

Ps. I think I'm gonna just roll on stocks and Not get a Last name to be
unique =)

Thanks To all in Advance,
Chancez Bard of the 22nd Chord on BristleBane.
"Do Not Fear What You Can Not Understand"

´┐¢ You Wouldn't Change Me If You Could ´┐¢
